page.title: 11LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: This week we went to interview the oldest man who lives in the village.He told us that he used to have to go down into Oswestry to get his{entertainment}from the pictures.He used to live in Weston Rhyn.He has lived in Selattyn since 1933.He had no transport so he biked it to town. The village shop was there when he came to the village.There was a butchers in the white house. He had a job in Weston Rhyn working on a farm, He used to get 25 shillings a week. His father helped to build the school. The old gentleman lives on his own as his wife died. On Wednesday each week he goes on special market day bus into Oswestry to do his shopping.
